required_tools.description: A well-sharpened knife is essential for cutting through the cake cleanly without crumbling.
A specialized cake cutter with a straight edge or serrated blade to make even slices.
A stable, flat surface for the cake to be placed on while slicing.
A ruler or cake divider to ensure consistent slice sizes.

required_conditions.description: The cake should be firm enough to hold its shape during cutting and not be too soft or too hard.
Ensure the knife is held with a firm grip to maintain control and prevent uneven cutting.
Maintain the right angle while slicing to achieve even cuts and prevent squishing the cake.
Wipe the knife between slices to ensure clean cuts and prevent frosting or crumbs from sticking.
The cake should be at room temperature or slightly chilled for cleaner, easier slicing.
